front.title: A Guide to Implementing Stateless DHCPv6 Service

abstract.t: Stateless DHCPv6 service is used by hosts to obtain configurationinformation such as the addresses of DNS servers that does notrequire the maintenance of any dynamic state for individual clients.A host that uses stateless DHCP must have obtained its IPv6 addressesthrough some other mechanism, typically stateless addressautoconfiguration. This document is a guide to the protocol messagesand options that must be implemented to provide stateless DHCPv6service.
